html:
My 2024 hostess gift guide is filled with everything I love to gift the hosts of parties during the holiday season. Everything from foodie gifts to fun gifts to fancy gifts are here!

My hostess gift guide is filled with the things I LOVE to bring as gifts to hosts. Whether it’s someone I’m very close, a neighbor or even an acquaintance, I have tons of ideas that I love to use for host gifts. I keep some of these on hand during the year too. My grandma was and my mom is so good at this, so I like to think that I have some signature gifting abilities when it comes to hostess gifts!

2024 Hostess Gift Guide

Funny cocktail napkins. This is a signature gift for my family. One of my favorites!

Brightland pizza oil set. Best of the best oil. The pizza oil is incredible!

Compartes truffle set. No one can say no to fancy chocolate!

Compartes chocolate bar. The bar flavors are incredible. They make excellent gifts!

Sugarfina champagne & caviar set. This is so fancy and fun for the holiday season. 

Espresso martini candy cubes. These too!

Truffle butter sauce set. And this would be great for a foodie. 

Absorbent marble drink coasters. I’ve gifted many of these. They are remarkable. Crazy how well they work. 

Air wine bottle chiller. Obsessed with this idea. Gifting it to many people!

Modern candy glass dish. I have a few of these and have gifted them. They are so pretty! Fill with candy for a festive touch. 

Red and Marble salt cellars. Gorgeous to display!

Glass and marble snack bowls. I have these and love them. I use them constantly! Pair with some fancy nuts or gummies. 

Black golden marble candle. This is so pretty. Not sure I could burn it! It’s so decorative and gorgeous. 

Modern brass candle snuffer. My grandma always gifted candle snuffers. I loved it! 

Black and white decorative tray. Stunning – perfect for someone you’re close with. 

Stemware cleaning brush. Paired with 2 glasses, this is so practical and something I wouldn’t buy for myself. 

Salt gift set. I love gifting flavored salts so much.

Aged balsamic and olive oil set. Best olive oil ever. I’ve used this for over 15 years and it is incredible. 

Casamigos cocktail set. If you know a tequila or marg lover, this is perfect. 

Striped bottle olive oil. This is stunning and I have gifted it before. It’s so pretty to display in the kitchen. 

Peppermint bark. The GOAT. 

Hotel Lobby reed diffuser. I adore the hotel lobby scents. 

Marble flower decorative bowl. This is so pretty and can have so many uses. Pair it with a tiny chocolate box!

Paint anywhere paint set. I would LOVE to get this. Something that is not cooking-related and is relaxing and fun. 

Faux fur throw blanket. Extremely cozy and cuddly for the cold months. 

Cozy cocoon fringe blanket. Super pretty and cozy!

Lustered stemless martini glasses. These are my favorite glasses ever. Gifting two with a jar of blue cheese olives would be perfect.

Gilded glass jar candle. Absolutely gorgeous. 

Candle charms. These are SO cute.

Iridescent match cloche. This is so stunning and a showstopper piece for a great price. 

Fruity tea sampler. Delicious and fun!

Sugar and spice tea sampler. One of my favorite things to gift in the cooler months. 

5 part wood server. Beautiful. I don’t know anyone who wouldn’t love this. 

Marble tic tac toe set. I think this is so fun and such a character piece. 

Marble cheese knives. These are beautiful AND useful. 

Yeti cocktail shaker. Love how this just goes on top of any yeti cup. It’s awesome. 

[This is not a sponsored post and any of the above items that I own were purchased by me! There are a few general affiliate links above where I make a commission from products purchased. Thank you for reading! xo]
